body:
Comment 5: 
The codereview plugin will check the paths.default property of the current repo.
It only allow it to be a URL, and apparently /tmp/gobuilder/goroot is not a valid one.

You have to find the configuration file and disable the plugin.
($HOME/.hgrc, /etc/mercurial/hgrc, or even /etc/mercurial/hgrc.d/*.rc)
(Also note that, if hg is installed to /usr/local/bin, you should check
/usr/local/etc/mercurial/hgrc)
